name: NuVisions Consulting Group
overview:
Connect with over 2.4 million journalists world wide to expand your customer base locally, regionally, nationally & globally!

NuVisions database includes detailed information on more than 1.4 million global, and one million U.S. media contacts including: media outlets, bloggers, and analysts. In addition, your company will gain access to publicity opportunity information such as editorial calendars, awards, conferences, and trade shows.

NuVisions helps you analyze the impact of social media conversations on your brand and online reputation. With dozens of charts at your fingertips, you can easily analyze online conversations about your brand and compare them against your competitors.

In seconds, you can see if the discussions are positive or negative, know who among your competitors is being discussed the most and even analyze your brandâ€™s reputation over time. You can also compare social media conversations with those occurring in influential blogs and traditional media.
